00129         private void SetupData(HttpWebRequest Request)
00130         {
00131             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Data))
00132             {
00133                 Request.ContentLength = 0;
00134                 return;
00135             }
00136             try
00137             {
00138                 byte[] ByteData = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Data);
00139                 Request.ContentLength = ByteData.Length;
00140                 using (Stream RequestStream = Request.GetRequestStream())
00141                 {
00142                     RequestStream.Write(ByteData, 0, ByteData.Length);
00143                 }
00144             }
00145             catch { throw; }
00146         }
00147 
00154         private void SetupCredentials(HttpWebRequest Request)

00160                     Request.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(UserName, Password);
00161                 }
00162             }
00163             catch { throw; }
00164         }

00171         private string SendRequest(HttpWebRequest Request)
00172         {
00173             try
00174             {
00175                 using (HttpWebResponse Response = Request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse)
00176                 {
00177                     if (Response.StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.OK)
00178                         throw new Exception("The request did not complete successfully and returned status code " + Response.StatusCode);
00179                     using (StreamReader Reader = new StreamReader(Response.GetResponseStream()))
00180                     {
00181                         return Reader.ReadToEnd();
00182                     }
00183                 }
00184             }
00185             catch { throw; }
00186         }
